summary: The story of the New York accent, as told by New Yorkers.
cast: Penny Marshall|Amy Heckerling|James McBride|Pat Cooper|Alan Dershowitz|Pete Hamill|Joe Franklin|Nick Raio|Michele Carlo|Dom Ferrara|Patricia Fletcher|Alyssa Chiarelli|Kevin Albinder|Philip Fraboliso|Barbara Mensch|Kianna McRae-Stephen
title: If These Knishes Could Talk: The Story of the NY Accent
